captions.text: - You know when you're just walking along

and you think your face
is doing one thing,

but everyone else just
sees something else?

I'm actually really interested
in what you're saying
even though I know my face looks bored.
You can't tell that I'm enjoying this joke
With this one, I got to be honest,
I'm actually choosing not to smile.

But then it makes you super
nervous to meet new people

because even though you're
excited to meet them

your face is actually
saying something else.

comments.text: With the LISTENING and MEETING NEW PEOPLE parts I do get along xD﻿
